constituent: renowned, flowers, someone, puppet, sooty, old man, sun, day
koohiiStory1: Here I am, putting a wreath of flowers on my love doll´s head and pretending she is someone of great renowned.
koohiiStory2: This someone is so renowned they are covered with flowers every time they perform on stage.
kunYomi: あらわ.す、いちじる.しい
readingExamples: 著す (あらわ.す), 著しい (いちじる.しい)
